title: New Gamemode idea
body: I Don't know how good this idea would be or whether or not it can be made reality but I was thinking of a game mode that made you switch champs after every death for all summoners in the match. This game mode would provide for all players to have a preview of certain champs for limited time.

replies.body: how about a game where you play as 18 different champs, (starting at lvl 1 and lvling up per kill and moving on the nest champ) first one to the 18th champ wins. and getting executed makes you go back a champ. totally not copying gungame btw
Think this would be fun, but ARAM/Dominion/TT Only
If there was such a game, I'd probably give back all money for the items in previous inventory ( actual costs of items not sold prices) on top of the money he had before his death.
i guess you got me there. Never thought about it.
What would you do about item builds?
